text:
ok..let me explain my pitfalls.
I followed the docs (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/oauth-quickstart-guide> )and created an app in dev account.
how to connect my app from one HS account to another HS account. what I see is only apps from marketplace. how can I create  connected app or what I need to create in another account e.g client's account.
